main event: Observation of meteor-like object with a green tail flying from south to north for 15 seconds.
interesting points: The object was described as having a flash and seemed to flame out during its flight., The sighting occurred on I-35 highway between Ottawa and Baldwin, Kansas., The observer was a reliable salesman traveling at the time., The observation was made during clear night conditions with some high clouds., There was no photographic evidence provided in the report.
